i1.name: Hemorrhage
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Darius' ''' damaging [[basic attack]]s and [[Champion ability|abilities]] apply a [[stack]] of ''Hemorrhage'' to affected enemies for 5 seconds, dealing them{{ft|{{as|{{pp|3.25 to 7.5}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|7.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|1.25}} seconds over the duration,|{{as|{{pp|13 to 30}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''total''' physical damage}} over the duration,}}stacking up to 5 times and refreshing the duration from subsequent damaging attacks and abilities, for a maximum of{{ft|{{as|{{pp|3.25*5 to 7.5*5}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} with each tick.|{{as|{{pp|13*5 to 30*5}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''total''' physical damage}} over the duration.}} ''Hemorrhage'' deals 300% damage against {{tip|monsters}}.

''If Hemorrhage's '''total''' {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} damage is higher than the {{as|target's '''current''' health}}, a small area of {{tip|sight}} is granted around the target for the duration of Hemorrhage and for another 2 seconds after it ends.''
Upon applying 5 ''Hemorrhage'' stacks to an enemy {{tip|champion}} or killing one with {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}}, '''Darius''' gains ''Noxian Might'' for 5 seconds.

{{sbc|Noxian Might:}} '''Darius''' gains {{as|{{pp|20 to 56 for 10;64 to 80 for 3;105 to 205 for 5|formula=20 + 4 per level until level 10, then + 8 per level until level 13, then + 25 per level}}|attack damage}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} and instantly applies 5 ''Hemorrhage'' stacks through his usual means.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Darius' damaging basic attacks and Champion ability apply a stack of Hemorrhage to affected enemies for 5 seconds, dealing themstacking up to 5 times and refreshing the duration from subsequent damaging attacks and abilities, for a maximum of Hemorrhage deals 300% damage against monsters.
If Hemorrhage's total post-mitigation damage is higher than the target's current health, a small area of sight is granted around the target for the duration of Hemorrhage and for another 2 seconds after it ends.
Upon applying 5 Hemorrhage stacks to an enemy champion or killing one with Noxian Guillotine, Darius gains Noxian Might for 5 seconds.
Noxian Might: Darius gains 20undefined − 56 for 10;64undefined (based on level) bonus attack damage and instantly applies 5 Hemorrhage stacks through his usual means.
i1.notes:
* ''Hemorrhage'' does not apply to [[structures]] nor {{tip|wards}}.
* '''Darius'''' attacks and abilities have to deal damage to apply ''Hemorrhage''.
** ''Hemorrhage'' cannot be applied to/refreshed against {{tip|invulnerable}} targets.
** ''Hemorrhage'' '''can''' be applied to and refreshed against {{tip|shield|shielded}} targets.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} prevents ''Hemorrhage's'' application from abilities only.

q1.name: Decimate
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius''' hefts his axe for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, and then swings it around himself, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the ''handle''.

Against champions and large monsters, '''Darius''' {{tip|heal|heals}} for {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|changedisplay=true|type=enemies hit by the ''blade''|key=%|15 to 45 for 3|1;2;3+|formula=15%*Enemies hit. ''This is capped at 3 enemies.''}} of his '''missing''' health}}}}. The ''handle'' of '''Darius' ''' axe will not heal him nor apply nor refresh {{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius}}.
'''''Darius''' is unable to declare basic attacks or cast {{ai|Apprehend|Darius}} or {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}} during Decimate.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Darius hefts his axe for 0.75 seconds, and then swings it around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the handle.
Against champions and large monsters, Darius heals for 1;2;3+ ‒ undefined of his missing health. The handle of Darius' axe will not heal him nor apply nor refresh Hemorrhage.
Darius is unable to declare basic attacks or cast Apprehend or Noxian Guillotine during Decimate.
leveling: {{st|Blade Physical Damage|{{ap|50 to 170}} {{as|(+ {{ap|100 to 140}}% AD)}}|Handle Physical Damage|{{ap|50*0.35 to 170*0.35}} {{as|(+ {{ap|100*0.35 to 140*0.35}}% AD)}}}}
q1.notes: * ''Decimate'' will cancel if '''Darius''' enters {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} during the delay.

w1.name: Crippling Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius' ''' next [[basic attack]] within 4 seconds gains {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}}, has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, deals modified {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by 90% for 1 second.
If this attack [[kill]]s the target, half the cooldown is {{sti|ah|reduced}} and the {{as|{{sti|mana cost}}}} is refunded.
''Crippling Strike'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Darius' ''' basic attack timer, and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} with its '''total''' damage.
''The attack's animation can be cancelled by casting {{ai|Decimate|Darius}}, but the attack will still land.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Darius' next basic attack within 4 seconds gains 25 bonus range, has an uncancelable windup, deals modified physical damage and slows the target by 90% for 1 second.
If this attack kills the target, half the cooldown is reduced and the mana cost is refunded.
Crippling Strike resets Darius' basic attack timer, and can critically strike with its total damage.
The attack's animation can be cancelled by casting Decimate, but the attack will still land.
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the damage.
* ''Crippling Strike'' will trigger {{ri|Manaflow Band}}.
* Despite its name, ''Crippling Strike'' does not {{tip|cripple}} anymore.

e1.name: Apprehend
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius''' sweeps his axe in a cone in the target direction, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds while {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them towards him. Targets then rebound {{tt|150|Estimated}} units off of '''Darius''', remaining {{tip|airborne}} for a total of 1 second.
'''Darius''' also briefly gains {{tip|sight}} of the area around the pull.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Darius gains armor penetration.
Active: Darius sweeps his axe in a cone in the target direction, slowing enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds while pulling them towards him. Targets then rebound 150 units off of Darius, remaining airborne for a total of 1 second.
Darius also briefly gains sight of the area around the pull.
e1.notes:
* The {{tip|slow}} duration starts as soon as '''Darius''' grabs the target, meaning 50% {{tip|Tenacity}} will leave the target not slowed at all after the {{tip|airborne}} ends.
** This is disregarding stat update timing, which means that the target's movement speed may still be reduced for up-to {{fd|0.25}} seconds after the slow ends.
* Enemies hit by ''Apprehend'' will quickly be dragged to '''Darius''' before rebounding over a longer period.
** {{pending for test}}: The rebound location is determined when the target reaches '''Darius' '''location.
** The rebound's forced movement's duration is roughly {{fd|0.5}} seconds, finishing before the {{tip|airborne}} duration ends.
** {{pending for test}}: There is no {{tip|stun}} applied for the same duration of the {{tip|airborne}}, meaning {{tip|brittle}} cannot extend the disable duration. It will, however, increase the {{tip|slow}} duration.
* After the pull, '''Darius''' will attempt to basic attack the closest pulled target.
* The armor penetration {{tip|stacks multiplicatively}} with other forms of [[Armor_penetration#Percentage_armor_penetration|percentage armor penetration]].

r1.name: Noxian Guillotine
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius''' attempts to execute the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|lunge|leaping}} towards them to deal them {{sti|{{as|true damage}}}}, increased by {{pp|type=[[File:Hemorrhage.png|20px]] Hemorrhage stacks|key=%|0 to 100 by 20|0 to 5}}, and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area around them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds from the start of the cast time.

If the target dies within {{fd|0.15}} seconds after being hit by ''Noxian Guillotine'', '''Darius''' causes all nearby {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} to {{tip|flee}} from him for 3 seconds, during which they are rapidly {{tip|slow|slowed}} by up to 99% over the duration, and is able to recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost, which refreshes on further executions.
At rank 3, ''Noxian Guillotine'' has no {{sti|{{as|mana cost}}}} and recast timer.
'''''Darius''' is unable to cast {{ai|Decimate|Darius}} and {{ai|Apprehend|Darius}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after Noxian Guillotine's cast time.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Darius attempts to execute the target enemy champion, leaping towards them to deal them true damage, increased by 0 to 5 ‒ undefined, and granting sight of the area around them for 2.5 seconds from the start of the cast time.
If the target dies within 0.15 seconds after being hit by Noxian Guillotine, Darius causes all nearby minions and monsters to flee from him for 3 seconds, during which they are rapidly slowed by up to 99% over the duration, and is able to recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost, which refreshes on further executions.
At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine has no mana cost and recast timer.
Darius is unable to cast Decimate and Apprehend for 0.25 seconds after Noxian Guillotine's cast time.
leveling: {{st|True Damage|{{ap|100|200|300}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Bonus Damage Per Stack|{{ap|20|40|60}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum True Damage|{{ap|200|400|600}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The ability does not go on {{sti|cooldown}} nor consume {{tip|mana}} if it's interrupted during the cast. This may only happen if:
** '''Darius''' or his target {{tip|death|dies}} during the leap.
** '''Darius''' loses {{tip|sight}} of his target despite the reveal.
** The target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Noxian Guillotine's'' cooldown after the recast or recast window is calculated by taking the values at the end, and using this formula: (''Noxian Guillotine's'' Cooldown - time since first cast){{times}}(1 - {{sti|cdr}}).
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' applies {{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius}} after the damage.
* '''Darius''' will only leap towards the target if it is at range, or leap backwards if it is very close.
** This leap can pass very thin terrain and will otherwise not be able to. In any case, '''Darius''' will still hit the target.
** The ability is disabled while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} even if '''Darius''' is in the range in which he does not leap.
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' will not reset nor trigger {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Noxian Might}} if used to kill a {{tip|clone}} or a target protected by {{tip|resurrection}}.
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' will reset but not trigger {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Noxian Might}} if it finishes off a target that is in a {{tip|zombie state}}.
